extendedInfo.description: ALL FEATURES NOW UNLOCKED IN THE FREE VERSION!I've removed the advert, unlocked all effects and added all the frame rate controls to the free version. If you use the wallpaper on a regular basis please consider purchasing the $1 version and I'll ensure more updates :) No nag advert/admob hidden in there, all free. Have fun :)18 funky abstract live wallpaper, with new designs added regularly. Striking designs, every one completely customizable in a variety of ways.Made for day to day use, not showing off briefly and hastily removing. Pick a color to suit your lifestyle, flick through all the effects and find one that fits you!Features:* 18 unique animated wallpapers, in less than 40k of storage!* Maximum customization, minimum cost, on both wallet and battery.* Match any theme with a full RGB color selection, if you want a magenta spiral one day, and a green sunrise the next, don't let us stop you! * Generated on the fly, no videos or images in there.* Full speed control, ranging from completely static, to fairy silly.* Supports all modern phones and tablets, tested on Tegra/SGX/Adreno and Mali hardware, from Froyo to Jelly Bean.* The entire application comes in at a less than 40k, and most of that is the icon! This is about 2% the size of your average 8mp photo.* Pinpoint frame rate control, keeps everything nice and consistent!* "Quality" slider allows for a smooth transition from crystal clarity, to grainy retro.Low Fat in name, Low Fat in nature. Cashing in on the power of modern GL 2.0 phones to claw back as much battery life as possible. We've custom tuned every single wallpaper to have the absolute minimum impact. Even compared to a photo of your dear Gran, we offer far lower memory usage.To use - Home/Menu/Wallpaper/Live Wallpapers/Low Fat Live Wallpaper

reviews.title: Aries?
reviews.comment: \"Permissions: This application requires no special permissions to run.\".   Bit more info on what made you assume it was a virus? No permissions, no adverts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t think I\'d be impressed with such simple designs but I truly am! Hex is my least favorite since its not very active but I LOVE sunrise in black! Thank you very much for such a nice wallpaper!
reviews.author: Eli Jarvis

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It reminds me of old-school demos for the Commodore 64. Trying to pack in as cool of effects and designs into a miniscule amount of space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good on my Galaxy
reviews.comment: Lots of options, can make it look cool and 8 bit.
reviews.author: A Google User
